name: Benny Bluebird Cap and Diaper Cover - Great Photo Prop
description:
This listing is for a Bluebird Cap and matching Diaper cover.

Benny Bluebird is chirping outside your window! This cute little soft aqua birdy has a tangerine colored beak and curious eyes. The little tuft of feathers on top of his head completes the sweet songbird.
Paired with our matching soft aqua diaper cover with bright orange buttons, this set is just precious for photos of your little angel or as a wonderful baby shower gift!

*If you would like a flower or bow with your cap, or if you’d like a different color combo, just let us know in a note to the seller!*

Hand crocheted with love upon your order, this cap is fantastic as a photo prop, unique gift, dress up costume, or just for fun! Made using super soft and washable acrylic yarn, this cute cap is designed to keep you cozy warm and looking great.

*****Please include your size when ordering and allow one week for creating your custom order!*****

~~ Features & Benefits of Purchasing From A Tangled Skein ~~
* Individually handmade with extra attention to detail
* Durable and made to last, even after repeated hand washings
* Soft, lightweight, and stretchable
* Make excellent photo props and gifts
*Help the environment - every item you purchase from a small-scale independent artist or crafter strikes a small blow to the forces of mass production

If you don’t see a color combination you love, please contact me and I'd be delighted make something up just for you.

Check out the rest of our Sweet Sets Collection here-->http://www.etsy.com/shop/FromATangledSkein?section_id= 8162293

And see even more items here!--> http://www.FromATangledSkein.etsy.com

**Please note: because of varying computer screens and current dye lots, colors may differ slightly from picture shown**

I make diaper covers following standard sizing, unless otherwise requested:

Newborn
3 – 6 mo
6 – 12 mo

Diaper covers are easily adjustable with the attached buttons and will also stretch an additional inch or so.
Please include your preferred size in the notes to seller.

I make each hat following standard sizing, unless otherwise requested:

Newborn : 14.5"
3 - 6 mo : 14" - 17"
6 - 12 mo : 17" - 19"

Each hat will also stretch an additional inch or so.
Please include your preferred size in the notes to seller.

For the longest life of your hand crafted item, hand wash in cold water with mild liquid detergent and lay flat to dry.

name: Fringe Blanket/Hammock/Sling Photo Prop in Chocolate, Lavender, Aqua, Cream, Baby Blue, Purple, Butt
description:
This is a super soft and luxurious Fringe Blanket in a lovely deep chocolate with soft flecks of cream. The bed of the blanket is crafted with a super thick, super chunky, super soft, super stretchy yarn. Unstretched, the bed measures an extra roomy 21” x 14”

The fringe is hand tied with a huge assortment of novelty yarns and ribbon in beautiful shades of butter yellow, cream, chocolate, coffee, lavender, aqua, baby blue, soft seafoam, deep purple, navy, and silver. The fringe measures a full 23”

This exquisite item is a gorgeous newborn photography prop for home or studio. Baby can be laid sweetly on top, the blanket can be laid into a basket, or stretched out into a hammock or sling, or baby can be wrapped up snugly with it. Also lovely used in maternity shoots! The possibilities are endless for amazing photos.

*If you would like a different color combination, just let us know in a note to the seller!*

*****THIS IS A PHOTO PROP ONLY, PLEASE NEVER LEAVE BABY UNATTENDED IN THIS*****

*****Please allow one week for creating your custom order!*****

name: Daniel Dinosaur Earflap Hat - Butter Yellow and Fern Green Triceratops
description:
Daniel Dinosaur can’t wait to stomp around and play with your little one! Daniel is shown here in butter yellow with fern green trim. This fun triceratops has a spikey faceplate, three softly stuffed horns, and big bright eyes. On the back of his head are three green spots. He’ll have your little one stomping and roaring with imagination in no time!

*If you would prefer Delilah Dinosaur with a bow or flower, or if you’d like a different color combo, just let us know in a note to the seller!*

name: Twinkling Tutu in Strawberry Swirl - Adjustable, Hot Pink, Lavender, Baby Pink, White
description:
This listing is for our Twinkling Tutu in Strawberry Swirl.

This hand tied tutu is made with a beautiful combination of hot pink, lavender, baby pink, and white sparkling tulle and has a hot pink crocheted waistband that can be tied in a bow in front or in back. This soft crocheted waistband makes this tutu uniquely adjustable so it can grow with your little princess for years of play!

All our twinkling tutus are made with double layers of high quality tulle for a super full and fluffy tutu that won’t lose its poof.

If you would like a different color combination, or ribbon or bows added, please send us a convo! We would love to make something perfect for you!

Great for birthday parties, photo props, or just playing dress up!

*****Please include your size when ordering and allow one week for creating your custom order!*****

name: Ursula Unicorn Earflap Hat - White, Hot Pink, Lavender, Grape, Baby Pink
description:
Every little girl loves unicorns, and this beauty is no exception.
Ursula is a beautiful snow white unicorn cap with a sparkly white horn, a colorful, fluffy mane of hot pink, grape, lavender, and baby pink, and bright pink and lavender trimmed ears.
She is wonderful in photos of your princess or for dress up, especially when paired with one of our fluffy twinkling tutus!
